name: Doggy's Adventure
description:
Doggy's World is being over taken by Kamika save Doggy's World from darkness and take down the boss!

--------------------------

PS4 Controllers Are Compatible

Keyboards Are Compatible

Xbox Controllers Not Compatiable

----------------------------------

When you connect a controller to play Doggy's Adventure. Connect it before starting up the game so then it automatically switches to the controller instead of your standard keyboard.

Thanks alot :) Enjoy the game.  Ive been trying to get this out for years.
